_comments.DomainsFile: Path to text file with one domain per line (relative to script directory or absolute path)
_comments.LogFile: Path to log file (relative to script directory or absolute path, set to null to disable logging)
_comments.RateLimitDelayMs: Delay in milliseconds between API requests (free tier: 4 requests/min = 15000ms recommended)

Thresholds.MaliciousCount: Number of malicious detections to trigger alert (0 = any malicious detection)
Thresholds.SuspiciousCount: Number of suspicious detections to trigger alert
Thresholds.MinReputation: Minimum reputation score (-10 means alert if reputation is below -10)

EmailSettings.Cc: Optional: Array of CC email addresses
EmailSettings.Username: SMTP authentication username (optional, remove if not needed)
EmailSettings.Password: SMTP authentication password (optional, remove if not needed)
